definition: third period/tertiary (geological era since the extinction of the dinosaurs at the Cretaceous-Tertiary boundary 65 million years ago)
(prefix indicating ordinal number, e.g. first, number two etc)/order/(old) rank in the imperial examinations/mansion/(literary) but/just

sentences.english: Cathaya argyrophylla forest is a famous Tertiary relict phytocommunity-in the world.
sentences.chinese: 銀杉林是當今舉世矚目的第三紀殘遺植物羣落。

sentences.english: The evolution process of the Hualong Basin, one of fault basins in the upper reaches of the Yellow River .
sentences.chinese: 黃河上游的化隆盆地在第三紀期間爲古湖佔據。

sentences.english: Thus, it is considered that crustal stress field in the area investigated are relatively stable and uniform since Neogene.
sentences.chinese: 晚第三紀以來，該區構造應力場相對穩定和統一。

sentences.english: King George Island consists mainly of Tertiary volcanics which contain plentiful plagioclases.
sentences.chinese: 喬治王島第三紀火山岩含大量斜長石斑晶。

sentences.english: Torreya grandis Merrillii is tertiary relict plant, and is a precious economic species peculiar in China.
sentences.chinese: 香榧系第三紀孑遺植物，爲我國特有的珍貴經濟樹種。

sentences.english: The modification of pools dominated since Neogene.
sentences.chinese: 晚第三紀以來油氣藏調整爲主階段。

sentences.english: Cathaya argyrophylla is relic plant from the third glacial period, which has great research value.
sentences.chinese: 銀杉是第三紀冰川的遺孑植物，具有重大的科研價值。

sentences.english: The polygenetic compound uranium deposits are very important in the Neogene basins.
sentences.chinese: 新第三紀盆地中多因覆成鈾礦牀很重要。

sentences.english: Aim To analyze Tertiary period sedimentary environment of Qaidamu saline lake.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析柴達木盆地第三紀鹽湖的沉積環境。

sentences.english: The pre-Tetiary basement of the Pearl River Mouth Basin mainly consists of Yanshan magamatite.
sentences.chinese: 珠江口盆地前第三紀基底主要是燕山期岩漿岩。

sentences.english: The modem karst formation started in the old Tertiary Period, and matured in the Quatemary Period.
sentences.chinese: 現代岩溶的形成開始於老第三紀，成熟於第四紀。

sentences.english: The confluence of two mountain streams of the northwestern shore of the Neogene of silt on the rock.
sentences.chinese: 兩條山溪匯流處的西北岸的新第三紀的粉砂岩壁上。

sentences.english: The Dongying Depression is a Tertiary rift basin with rich petroleum resources.
sentences.chinese: 東營凹陷是一個含油氣十分豐富的第三紀裂谷盆地。

sentences.english: From the Cretaceous to Tertiary, fault sealing built up with thickening of the overlying strata.
sentences.chinese: 白堊紀至第三紀，隨上覆地層增厚，斷層封閉性增強。

sentences.english: The Baise basin is a typical pull-apart basin that was formed in Tertiary Period.
sentences.chinese: 百色盆地是一典型的第三紀走滑拉分盆地。

sentences.english: Extensive regions of wet forests characterized the Early Tertiary in Australia.
sentences.chinese: 廣佈的溼潤森林區是澳大利亞老第三紀的特徵。
